name: Lost and Found Service Simulator 2077
description:
Lost and Found service simulator 2077 is a point and click, simulation game. The story set in Neo BKK city, one of the megacity in this world with high-rank of criminals, stealing and robbing. You play as a newbie of Lost and Found service at some high-class Hotel, your job is to provides assistance for customers who have lost items and return to them. Just protection item and return, sound easy right? but please beware of a thief, who will impersonate a customer and try to steal that item anytime!!!

Submission to jam team: NEVER LET SUCCESS GET TO YOUR HEAD; NEVER LET FAILUU GET TO YOUR HEART.
